input.sentences: this is the road that leads to the farm .
the backyard of our house is very big .
there is so much space and beautiful views on the farm .
the animals are happy and grazing .
output.sentences: This road leads to my parents farm.
They have a big house with a big backyard.
The views from the farm were so amazing.
We were happy seeing the animals.
Mom and dad were having so much fun showing us the farm.
